testimonials.heading: Journeys Illuminated by Cosmic Insight
testimonials.voicesDescription: Discover how our cosmic guidance has illuminated paths and transformed lives. These are the experiences shared by those who have journeyed with us.

messages.title: My Readings
messages.description: Access your chat history and readings with astrologers.
messages.startReading: Start your first reading by selecting a service and an astrologer.
messages.conversationPrompt: Choose a chat from the list to view the messages.

services.servicesDescription: Discover our range of traditional Tamil astrological services, crafted with ancient wisdom to guide your life's journey.

marriageMatching.title: Marriage Matching
marriageMatching.description: Our expert astrologers analyze birth charts to determine compatibility between potential life partners, ensuring a harmonious and prosperous union based on ancient Tamil astrological principles.

jathakPrediction.title: Jathak Prediction
jathakPrediction.description: Discover your life's path through our detailed Jathak predictions. We interpret celestial positions at your birth to reveal insights about career, relationships, health, and spiritual growth.

jathakWriting.title: Jathak Writing
jathakWriting.description: Preserve your astrological blueprint with our meticulously crafted Jathak writing service. Our scholars document your birth chart with traditional methods, creating a valuable heirloom for generations.

hero.title: Discover Your Cosmic Path Through Ancient Wisdom
hero.subtitle: Explore the ancient Tamil art of astrology and spiritual guidance. Our personalized readings connect you with cosmic energies that have guided souls for millennia.

personalizedHero.subtitleUser: Connect with our expert astrologers and discover profound insights about your destiny, relationships, and life path.
personalizedHero.subtitleGuest: Explore authentic Vedic astrology readings, personalized horoscopes, and spiritual guidance from expert astrologers.
personalizedHero.noReadings: You haven't had any readings yet.
personalizedHero.guestPlaceholder: See what others are saying about their journey.
personalizedHero.chooseFavourite: Choose your favourite among the best astrologers from your district.
